name: br
summary:
The `
` HTML element produces a line break in text (carriage-return). It is useful for writing a poem or an address, where the division of lines is significant.
permittedContent: None, it is an empty element.
tagOmission:
Must have a start tag, and must not have an end tag. In XHTML documents, write this element as
.
permittedParents: Any element that accepts phrasing content.
